title: Ticket #4229: Unexpected shadow exception in tests
description:
Our test "job_basic_kill.run" fails occasionally due to getting a shadow exception which it did not register a handler for. It is an occasional error. on ten tests between 2/18 and 2/24 it happened. The shadow log always looks like this at the end. I have three sets of logs tucked away. 

02/24/14 17:48:39 (2.0) (25419): DaemonCore Timeout() Complete, returning 23
